issue.title: Abstraction of functionality
issue.body:
This is key, especially as the codebase is getting larger. 
Some possible organisations:
- Tab Manager
- Timer (already in its own .js file! 👍 )
- State management

This is key, especially as the codebase is getting larger. 
Some possible organisations:
- Tab Manager
- Timer (already in its own .js file! 👍 )
- State management

issue.title: New tab listener
issue.body:
We need a new tab listener in order to 
- set the category of the new tab 
- pin/not pin it based on its category

issue.title: New tab listener
issue.body:
listen for new tabs:
if tracked, do stuff
else, do nothing

issue.title: Categorise all tabs when tracking is enabled
issue.body:
When tracking is enabled, all the tabs must be categorised.
- Essential
    - Categorise everything into work
- Very optional
    - Query every tab in order to categorise it
    - Ask if the user wants all tabs to be work / rest
    - Create a list of work sites and rest sites, and check for matches to categorise

issue.title: Start/Stop/Reset for timer
issue.body: For users to be able to start work/rest cycles as and when they want.

issue.title: New tab listener
issue.body:
listen for new tabs:
if tracked, do stuff
else, do nothing

rename.from: query all tabs when tracking is enabled globally
rename.to: Categorise all tabs when tracking is enabled

issue.title: Categorise all tabs when tracking is enabled
issue.body:
When tracking is enabled, all the tabs must be categorised.
- Essential
    - Categorise everything into work
- Very optional
    - Query every tab in order to categorise it
    - Ask if the user wants all tabs to be work / rest
    - Create a list of work sites and rest sites, and check for matches to categorise

rename.from: Turning off tracking in browser_action --> effectively turning off extension
rename.to: Turning off tracking in browser_action should effectively turn off the extension

issue.title: Turning off tracking in browser_action should effectively turn off the extension
issue.body:
We should preferably 
- store tracking of all the tabs
- maybe change the icon of the extension to show that we are not tracking their tabs. 
- release tabs from pinned state if needed.

issue.title: Change UI to display either tracking or status
issue.body: This is confusing to the end-user. It would be beneficial to display only one
